A dove with wings spread wide, symbolizing freedom and peace. The wings could be made of intertwined hands, representing unity and togetherness.
A heart with a rainbow around it, symbolizing love and unity in diversity.
A tree with branches reaching out towards each other, symbolizing growth and cooperation.
A white flag with a blue circle in the center, symbolizing surrender and the end of conflict.
A yin yang symbol with a dove in the center, symbolizing balance and harmony.
